Key Match Events: Travis d'Arnaud hit the walk-off home run on a 2-0 fastball.
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals are trying to win and find a way to scratch out a couple of runs against the Braves' great pitching.
Post-Match Reflections: Seth Lugo's two scoreless innings on Saturday was a good way to finish the regular season and get set for October.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals clinched their postseason spot on Friday night, and it allowed them to rest their two best rotation arms for the postseason.
The Royals are currently holding the No. 6 seed in the AL field, but they could clinch the No. 5 seed and go to Baltimore to face the No. 4-seed Orioles if they win on Sunday and the Tigers lose.
Others: Bobby Witt Jr. was on the bench for the first time this season due to normal aches and pains at the end of the season.
Seth Lugo will be the one pitching in October.
